changelog.title: Manual Audit
changelog.content:
Bigger, Better Rewrite

We just updated the Rewrite feature so that it can be used on up to 9,000 words. We also changed the model powering it. Rewrite now uses Muse, so you get the highest quality rewrites possible. Happy writing!

topArticles.title: Which AI model should I use?
How many credits do features use?
Web App vs. Mobile App Differences

affected_articles.contradiction: Docs do not specify word limit for Rewrite feature, but changelog announces it now supports up to 9,000 words. Previous docs mention 6,000 words as the limit in Selection Menu article.
affected_articles.existing_passage: The mobile app's Rewrite allows you to transform any selected text with AI assistance.
affected_articles.corrected_text: The mobile app's Rewrite allows you to transform any selected text (up to 9,000 words) with AI assistance.

affected_articles.contradiction: Docs state Rewrite can be used on selections up to 6,000 words, but changelog announces the limit is now 9,000 words.
affected_articles.existing_passage: highlight a *single* word and you'll have the option to use Comment, Describe, open Quick Edit, or select from Related Words. Meanwhile, choose a longer selection of text and you'll get options such as Comment, Rewrite, Expand, or Visualize as well.
affected_articles.corrected_text: The Selection Menu article should be updated to reflect the new 9,000-word limit for Rewrite (currently the article does not explicitly state the word limit in the main text, but the transcript mentions 'up to 6000 words' in the context of Expand, which may need clarification).

affected_articles.contradiction: Docs state My Voice can rewrite selections up to 4,000 words, but if Rewrite now supports 9,000 words, this limit may be outdated or inconsistent.
affected_articles.existing_passage: You can select **short snippets** or **large sections** (up to **4,000 words**).
affected_articles.corrected_text: You can select **short snippets** or **large sections** (up to **9,000 words**).

affected_articles.contradiction: Changelog states 'Rewrite now uses Muse' but docs do not mention Muse powering the Rewrite feature. The Muse article lists features it powers (Draft, Write, Expand) but does not include Rewrite.
affected_articles.existing_passage: Muse is available in Draft, Write, and Expand. It also powers Synopsis generation in the Story Bible.
affected_articles.corrected_text: Muse is available in Draft, Write, Expand, and Rewrite. It also powers Synopsis generation in the Story Bible.

stage2_audit.summary: Four documentation contradictions identified: (1) Rewrite word limit increased from 6,000 to 9,000 words but not documented in Rewrite article; (2) Selection Menu article references outdated 6,000-word limit; (3) My Voice article references outdated 4,000-word limit for rewrites; (4) Muse article does not list Rewrite as a feature it powers, contradicting the changelog announcement that 'Rewrite now uses Muse.'
